error.title: Scene setting
error.description:
## Invalid scene setting found
One of the settings in a scene doesn't match to asset settings in database.
{invalid_setting_str}
### How to repair?
Change values for {invalid_keys_str} in the scene OR change them in the asset database if they are wrong there.
error.detail:
### __Detailed Info__ (optional)
This error is shown when for example resolution in the scene doesn't match to resolution set on the asset in the database. Either value in the database or in the scene is wrong.

error.title: Scene file doesn't exist
error.description:
## Scene file doesn't exist
Collected scene {scene_url} doesn't exist.
### How to repair?
Re-save file, start publish from the beginning again.
